title: Kylie Jenner 'files restraining order against intoxicated fan' who hiked to her Hidden Hills mansion
text:
Keeping Up with the Kardashians star Kylie Jenner has reportedly filed a restraining order against a 'glass pipe-smoking fan' who managed to hike to her $12M Hidden Hills house on Tuesday.

The 22-year-old man was charged with two counts - misdemeanor trespass and bringing contraband (the pipe) into jail - after 'pounding on the front door' of the eight-bedroom mansion 'demanding to see' the 22-year-old Lip Kit mogul, according to TMZ.

Lawyer Shawn Chapman Holley filed legal documents ensuring the unnamed fellow stays at minimum 100 yards away from Kylie, her homes, and her cars.

Scary! Kylie Jenner has reportedly filed a restraining order against a 'glass pipe-smoking fan' who managed to hike to her $12M Hidden Hills house on Tuesday (pictured October 16)

Must stay 100 yards away! The 22-year-old man was charged with two counts - misdemeanor trespass and bringing contraband (the pipe) into jail - after 'pounding on the front door' of the eight-bedroom mansion 'demanding to see' the 22-year-old Lip Kit mogul

Luckily, Jenner and her 20-month-old daughter Stormi Webster were not inside the supposedly-secure gated community at the time of the trespassing.

'She's afraid the guy will continue to stalk her and come to her home in the future,' a source told the site.

'She says the guy follows her and other members of her family on social media.'

The Calabasas socialite frequently shares glimpses of the inside and outside of her Martyn Lawrence Bullard-designed Hidden Hills property with her captive, combined 206.9M followers/subscribers.

Close call: Luckily, Kylie and her 20-month-old daughter Stormi Webster were not inside the supposedly-secure gated community at the time of the trespassing (pictured October 16)

A source told TMZ: 'She's afraid the guy will continue to stalk her and come to her home in the future. She says the guy follows her and other members of her family on social media' (pictured Monday)

Halloween décor: Jenner frequently shares glimpses of the inside and outside of her Martyn Lawrence Bullard-designed Hidden Hills property with her captive, combined 206.9M followers/subscribers (pictured Friday)

Retreat: The 'self-made billionaire' can always retreat to one of her family's neighboring mansions as well as the seven-bedroom, 9K-square-foot Beverly Hills house she and babydaddy Travis Scott bought for $13.45M a year ago

The 'self-made billionaire' can always retreat to one of her family's neighboring mansions as well as the seven-bedroom, 9K-square-foot Beverly Hills house she and babydaddy Travis Scott bought for $13.45M a year ago.

Catch more of the nepotistically-privileged daughter of Caitlyn Jenner in the 17th season of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, which airs Sundays on E!

The Kardashian-Jenner clan scored nominations for four trophies - including best reality show - at the People's Choice Awards, which air November 10 on E!

Kylie and half-sister Khloé Kardashian will both compete for best reality star, and Kim Kardashian West scored nods for best social celebrity and best style star.

'Rumour Has It': Catch more of the nepotistically-privileged daughter of Caitlyn Jenner in the 17th season of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, which airs Sundays on E!
description: The 22-year-old man was charged with two counts - misdemeanor trespass and bringing contraband into jail - after 'pounding on the front door' of the house 'demanding to see' the 22-year-old Lip Kit mogul
